New_Orleans.Loft 523: Loft 523 is a boutique hotel located at 523 Gravier Street in New Orleans, Louisiana, in the city’s central business district, near the French Quarter. The building was erected in the 1880s as a carriage and dry-goods warehouse, and it was purchased and renovated by real-estate developer Sean Cummings. It features eighteen loft style guestrooms, three of which are penthouses.
